name: Windows Live Photo Gallery Information File
summary: Learn about .PD5 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: By default, PD5 files have the name Pictures.pd5 and are found in the following user directory: %USERPROFILE%\​AppData\​Local\​Microsoft\​Windows Live Photo Gallery
If a PD5 file becomes corrupted, it may be renamed to OLD_Pictures.pd5, and Windows Live Photo Gallery will automatically create a new Pictures.pd5 file.
NOTE: Microsoft Windows Live Photo Gallery is no longer developed.
